attained_goal.title: Have I attained the goal which I established as my objective for this year?
attained_goal.description: You should work with a definite yearly objective to be attained as a part of your major life objective.

delivered_service_quality.title: Have I delivered service of the best possible quality of which I was capable, or could I have improved any part of this service?

delivered_service_quantity.title: Have I delivered service in the greatest possible quantity of which I was capable?

had_cooperative_conduct.title: Has the spirit of my conduct been harmonious and cooperative at all times?

permitted_procrastination.title: Have I permitted the habit of procrastination to decrease my efficiency and if so, to what extent?

improved_personality.title: Have I improved my personality, and if so, in what ways?

followed_plans_to_completion.title: Have I been persistent in following my plans through to completion?

reached_prompt_decisions.title: Have I reached decisions promptly and definitely on all occasions?

permitted_fears.title: Have I permitted any one or more of the six basic fears to decrease my efficiency?
permitted_fears.description: Six basic fears: poverty, criticism, ill health, loss of love of someone, old age, death

had_relationship_with_associates.title: Has my relationship with my associates in work been pleasant, or unpleasant?
had_relationship_with_associates.description: If it has been unpleasant, has the fault been partly, or wholly mine?

lacked_concentration.title: Have I dissipated any of my energy through lack of concentration of effort?

was_open_minded.title: Have I been open-minded and tolerant in connection with all subjects?

how_service_was_improved.title: In what way have I improved my ability to render service?

was_intemperate.title: Have I been intemperate in any of my habits?

was_egotistic.title: Have I expressed, either openly or secretly, any form of egotism?
was_egotistic.description: Excessive use of the first person singular personal pronoun, the practice of talking about oneself too much, an exaggerated sense of self-importance.

was_respected.title: Has my conduct toward my associates been such that it has induced them to respect me?

used_guesswork_or_analysis.title: Have my opinions and decisions been based upon guesswork, or accuracy of analysis and thought?

followed_budgets.title: Have I followed the habit of budgeting my time, my expenses, and my income, and have I been conservative in these budgets?

engaged_in_unprofitable_effort.title: How much time have I devoted to unprofitable effort which I might have used to better advantage?

how_change_time_and_habit.title: How may I re-budget my time, and change my habits so I will be more efficient during the coming year?

was_guilty_of_immoral_actions.title: Have I been guilty of any conduct which was not approved by my conscience?

provided_more_service_than_price.title: In what ways have I rendered more service and better service than I was paid to render?

was_unfair.title: Have I been unfair to anyone, and if so, in what way?

satisfied_with_my_services.title: If I had been the purchaser of my own services for the year, would I be satisfied with my purchase?

have_matching_vocation.title: Am I in the right vocation, and if not, why not?

customer_satisfied_with_my_services.title: Has the purchaser of my services been satisfied with the service I have rendered, and if not, why not?

my_success_rating.title: What is my present rating on the fundamental principles of success?
my_success_rating.description: Make this rating fairly, and frankly, and have it checked by someone who is courageous enough to do it accurately.
